title: The Diva Doctrine: 16 Universal Principles Every Woman Needs to Know [Paperback] Patricia V. Davis [Paperback] Patricia V. Davis [Paperback] Patricia V. Davis [Paperback] Patricia V. Davis [Paperback] Patricia V. Davis [Paperback] Patricia V. Davis
description: Patricia V. Davis may be the first to tell you she's an 'Expert in Failed Relationships'. But ask any of the readers who helped a post on her advice blog go viral, and they'll tell you that whether you're a wide-eyed twenty-something dreamer or someone a bit older, there's no one better able to help you on your way to becoming a True a walk-with-confidence, savvy woman who is both passionate and compassionate!
author: Patricia V. Davis
